---
title: "Ask a question"
---

We welcome questions and suggestions that would benefit others in the department.

**Helpful submissions include:**\

- A clearly defined methodological question  
- A reproducible example (preferred)  
- A reference or paper you would like discussed  
- A proposal for a workshop topic  

Submissions may lead to a brown bag session, a short technical note, or an addition to our shared archive.
